## hasRedChannel() function

Check if a given texture format contains a red channel.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hasRedChannel(format: TextureFormat): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | [TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md) | The texture format to be checked. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the texture format contains a red channel, otherwise false
